author: James Joyce
text: Dear Budgen: I see by a card sent to 12 rue de l’Odeon that you are in Paris. If you have not left will you please ring me up (Ségur 95–20) before 11 a.m. on Thursday or Friday morning as I shall be glad to hear from you. I hope Suter got the presentation copy of the German Ulysses which I asked the publishers in Stuttgart to send him. Sincerely yours James Joyce
